text: Parama pabitra o mahimamaya satta tini, yini sbiya bandake ratri belaya bhramana kariyechilena masajide harama theke masajide akasa paryanta-yara cara dike ami paryapta barakata dana karechi yate ami tamke kudaratera kichu nidarsana dekhiye de'i. Niscaya'i tini parama srabanakari o darsanasila.
